kvs.page-description: Anyone holding Fair tokens automatically joins the FAIR DAO. If you have spare time, you can also participate in the development and operation of FAIR DAO projects.

worker-items.name: Join DAO
worker-items.des: You automatically become a member of the FAIR DAO organization as long as you hold Fair tokens.

worker-items.name: Get Tokens
worker-items.des: You can purchase them on the SunPump launchpad, buy now

worker-items.name: Participate
worker-items.des: If you are a programmer, UI designer, translator, etc., we welcome you to participate in the development and operation of the FAIR DAO project.
